reviewText: 5 stars because it was purchased for my niece & she LUVS it! BTW she's seven. :)
I purchased this DVD for my daughter. She loved it. Thank you for your service. Well done, no problems. Look forward to ordering in the future.
Why are the sonic x series dvds so damn expensive? My 3 year old loves Sonic X and he watches what dvds I could find for him constantly and thats all I care about.

I would have to say it's probably one of the best Saturday morning like cartoons I have ever seen.  There is kind of a sad ending to the series though, leaving a lot unexplained.  Some say that the series is complete, but I think they planed on having a lot more personally.  Oh ya, and good job on the prompt delivery.  It was in good condition too :)
Love it... Any time any Day... refer to Preview one on Previous Sonic X DVD set...
